name: Senior Algo developer
description:
Gett Delivery is a platform for mega accounts, B2B and B2C customers. Our company has a mission to organize all the best delivery services, in one global platform with great UX. We aim to optimize the entire experience - from routing to booking to invoicing and analytics, so businesses can focus on what they do best.

In order to offer to our clients the best price, and in order to offer a high reliability for delivering the packages, we are building smart and advanced routing and matching algorithms.

Our main technology stack on the algo side is based on GoLang, Java and Python.

We are looking for a Senior Algo Developer who will join our pationant & fun team to build the best Delivery product. Our Marketplace team consists of Product managers, Backend developers , Frontend developers, Algo developers, QA & Automation developers. We also work closely with the main Gett Algo team.

We are offering:

Monthly bonus for Gett taxi services;

Extended medical insurance;

Remote work equipment

Friendly and cheerful team.

Requirements:

  • At least 3 years of experience as an algorithm engineer (algo research & development)

  • At least 2 years of experience in data research / analysis

  • At least 1 year of experience with hands on experience in production code

  • Msc in Mathematics / Computer science / Physics, or equivalent

  • Good English communication skills, both verbal and written

Advantages:

  • Transportation/routing problems (VRP etc..)

  • GoLang/Java/Python/Matlab/C++

  • Backend development experience

  • Graph theory and algorithms

  • Local search, metaheuristics

  • Discrete optimization

  • Gurobi/cplex Mixed integer programming
